title: Blockchain private credit and tokenized treasuries value hits combined $1.34B continuing RWA resurgence
description:
In a turnaround from last year’s downturn, real-world assets (RWAs) such as private credit leveraging blockchain technology have witnessed a significant rebound. On-chain Private Credit. According to rwa.xyz, there has been a 127% surge in active private loans via digital ledgers since the beginning of 2023, currently at around $581 million. This recovery, though still […]

title: As bitcoin dips, altcoins are coming back to buy zones
description: Bitcoin is still maintaining the downward trend it has been following since it made its recent yearly high at nearly $45,000. Altcoins are faring worse than bitcoin and much deeper pullbacks are being experienced. Is the time coming to buy alts again?

title: Man Fingered in the July 2022 Hack on 2 Decentralized Exchanges Pleads Guilty to Computer Fraud
description: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York announced on Dec. 14 that Shakeeb Ahmed, a man accused of hacking two decentralized crypto exchanges, had pleaded guilty to the charge of computer fraud. Ahmed is said to have attempted to cover his tracks by using overseas crypto exchanges and swapping the stolen assets with […]

title: Massive Leaks Reveal Potential Return of Arkham Series Villains in Suicide Squad
description: In the wake of the closed beta test for the highly anticipated game “Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League,” a series of massive leaks have surfaced, providing players and fans with intriguing but unverified details about the game’s storyline.  These leaks hint at the potential return of major villains from the acclaimed Batman: Arkham series, […]

title: Ubisoft’s Latest Release in the Avatar Universe
description: Ubisoft’s much-anticipated video game adaptation of James Cameron’s Avatar universe, titled “Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora,” was released on December 7th, 2023. The game offers players the chance to explore the lush and vibrant world of Pandora, sixteen years after the events of the 2009 movie.  With stunning visuals, expansive landscapes, and some unique gameplay elements, […]

title: Decentralized Exchange Jupiter (JUP) to airdrop four billion-tokens in 2024
description: The Solana-based decentralized exchange (DEX), Jupiter, is set to airdrop a billion of its native JUP tokens early next year. The announcement, made by the project’s founder known as Meow, reveals a comprehensive plan to distribute a total of 10 billion JUP tokens, emphasizing a 50-50 split between the community and the Jupiter team.
